mapper.sql: id, openid, name, card_id, birthday, phone, sex, login_account, login_pass, sort, is_valid, account_non_expired, credentials_non_expired, account_non_locked, email, update_user_id, update_time, create_user_id, create_time, remark
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.openid, a.name, a.card_id AS cardId, a.birthday, a.phone, a.sex, a.type, a.login_account AS loginAccount, a.login_pass AS loginpass, a.is_valid AS isValid, a.account_non_expired AS accountNonExpired, a.credentials_non_expired AS credentialsNonExpired, a.account_non_locked AS accountNonLocked, a.email, a.update_user_id AS updateUserId, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.create_user_id AS createUserId, a.create_time AS createTime, a.remark, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`dept_id`) AS deptId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`role_id`) AS roleId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT c.name) AS deptName, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT d.name) AS roleName FROM t_sys_user a LEFT JOIN `t_sys_user_depts_roles` b ON a.`id` = b.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `t_sys_dept` c ON b.`dept_id` = c.`id` LEFT JOIN `t_sys_role` d ON b.`role_id` = d.`id` WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY a.`id`
